net.birelian.mp3player.core

Class PlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.birelian.mp3player.core.PlayerManager

  • public class PlayerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Player manager. Uses a CustomPlayer object for playing mp3 files.
    Author:
    birelian
